 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° After more than 8 years of nonstop releasing we are proud to present  Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° you our 10000th 0day release, thus being only the third group ever    Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° to reach this barrier. From the day BLiZZARD was formed in february   Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° 1998 we have always been on the very top of the release rankings and  Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º

 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° idleness or relaxation.                                               Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° Over the years many friends joined us and we have grown to become     Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º

 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° for all of us, however unity and friendship have always remained,     Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° even during times of upheaval and depression. All parts of BLiZZARD   Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º

 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° family has never vanished and has always given us a very unique       Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° character.                                                            Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° Although we have always appreciated being one of the most active      Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° release groups our primary concern has never been to rule the scene   Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° but to spend a very nice time of our lives along with many good       Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° friends. Friendship and fun will always be our most valuable          Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° principles and according to them we will act. Over the years we have  Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° neither been involved in any groupflames nor have we offended other   Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
 Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â° scene people without reason. Unlike many other groups we do not       Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€º
